aberrant_alteration.name: Aberrant Alteration
aberrant_alteration.description: Your Fisher’s appearance is changed slightly by the Deep. Reduce all of your Fathomless tags by 2 up to a minimum of 2+.

a_brush_with_the_deep.name: A Brush With The Deep
a_brush_with_the_deep.description: You learn a Deep-Word from the Deep-Tongue list. This Development can be taken multiple times.

anatomical_studies.name: Anatomical Studies
anatomical_studies.description: 1/Turn, When you force a Fish to perform a Kill Check by damaging them you may force them to modify the result by 1 in either direction.

benefactor.name: Benefactor
benefactor.description: You don’t have to spend NOVOK to Rearm, Resupply and Repair your Gear. When you take the Reallocate Hardpoints Shoreleave Action it does not cost NOVOK and it can be taken in addition to any other Shoreleave Action.

calming_thoughts.name: Calming Thoughts
calming_thoughts.description: You gain +2 Maximum Marbles. Your current Marbles remain unchanged.

encore.name: Encore
encore.description: Once per Encounter, perform any of your Maneuvers a second time. You are still limited to 1 Maneuver per turn.

fathomless_curio.name: Fathomless Curio
fathomless_curio.description: You may choose a Fathomless Curio from the list of Fathomless Curio. Going forward it is available to be installed on your Gear

fixer.name: Fixer
fixer.description: Gain +1 Repair Kit. When you spend a Repair Kits (your own or one given to you by another Fisher) remove 1 additional Marked Damage from your Gear.

get_it_together.name: Get It Together
get_it_together.description: Whenever you lose your Marbles and roll on the Meltdown Table you may adjust the result by 1 in either direction. When you perform a Narrative Check or assist another Fisher with one any results of 1 do not subtract a success.

hardy_physique_or_prosthetics.name: Heavy Physique or Prosthetics
hardy_physique_or_prosthetics.description: You ignore all results from the “Gear Destruction” table except “Killed in Action” going forward. If your Fisher is suffering any persistent effects from the table already, they are cleared.

lone_wolf.name: Lone Wolf
lone_wolf.description: When deploying at the start of an Encounter you may choose to deploy adjacent to a different battlefield edge than the other Fishers. If you do, your Ballast is 1 during the first Round of the Encounter.

lightweight_construction.name: Lightweight Construction
lightweight_construction.description: Gain +1 Speed. After your Gear’s final BALLAST has been determined, reduce it by 1.

procure_new_fishing_gear.name: Procure New Fishing Gear
procure_new_fishing_gear.description: You discard your old Fishing Gear. Choose a new Gear. Unlock Hardpoints on it equal to the number of extra Hardpoints unlocked on your previous Gear. (via Level Up or other effects) You do not need to Maintain your Fishing Gear this Shoreleave.

redundant_construction.name: Redundant Construction
redundant_construction.description: Choose one of your Internals without the Fragile or Unstable Tag, it gains the Sturdy tag. You may change which Internal gains this benefit each time you Maintain your Fishing Gear during Shore Leave.

tinkerer.name: Tinkerer
tinkerer.description: Immediately Unlock 4 Hardpoints on your Gear.

vanquisher.name: Vanquisher
vanquisher.description: Whenever you destroy a Fish roll 1d3.  You and all Fishers in your Line of Sight regain that many Marbles.
